name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 10+ years of experience in high-performance software solutions, proficient in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and adept in cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Skilled in building robust applications using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, with expertise in implementing event-driven architectures utilizing **Kafka**, **Pub/Sub**, and **AWS MSK**. Demonstrated ability to lead the development of scalable platforms that leverage modern frameworks and libraries, while ensuring compliance with industry standards. Proven track record of deploying cloud-native applications with a focus on automation, real-time analytics, and intelligent decision-making.
Additionally, brings practical experience in MLOps, encompassing the development of ML pipelines and managing workflows with tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Committed to delivering secure, maintainable solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also positively impact business outcomes.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions using **Python**, ensuring high performance and maintainability while adhering to regulatory standards.
• Developed microservices architecture leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for deployment, achieving high availability and fault tolerance in production environments.
• Utilized cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure** for building and deploying applications, improving system scalability and reliability.
• Built and maintained robust data architecture with efficient data ingestion and querying, optimized for large-scale applications in healthcare and finance.
• Integrated event-driven architectures with **Kafka** and **AWS MSK**, enhancing data flow and processing capabilities across services.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve system design and development processes, leading to a 30% increase in application delivery speed.
• Established and implemented CI/CD pipelines using **AWS**, effectively reducing deployment times by **50%** and improving code quality through automated testing.
• Delivered financial analysis tools utilizing **Python**, enabling real-time insights into transactional data with significant reduction in query times.
• Designed unit, integration, and performance test strategies enhancing code reliability and reducing bug rates by **40%** through frameworks like Jest and PyTest.
• Engaged in continuous learning and development on emerging technologies, implementing best practices around **Azure Cognitive Services** and **GCP** for intelligent application enhancements.

Utilized **Python** and **TypeScript** to spearhead the development and modernization of financial platforms, implementing a microservices-based architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), leading to a **30%** increase in scalability and reliability for high-volume transaction systems.
Designed and developed dynamic, user-centric front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, while integrating **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to enhance performance and responsiveness of a **50%** increase in user engagement.
Engineered real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, which enabled operations teams to efficiently track financial activity with a reduction in report generation time by **40%**.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to architect a robust event-driven system, permitting efficient asynchronous communication and facilitating real-time event processing,
Devised and managed ETL pipelines leveraging **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for seamless batch and real-time data ingestion from **10+** internal and third-party sources.
Developed AI/ML-powered fraud detection mechanisms using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, resulting in a **25%** decrease in fraudulent transaction occurrences by analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior.
Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, embedding model inference directly into backend services to enable real-time decision-making.

Utilized **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime and scalability for key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Implemented **Docker** containers and **Kubernetes** orchestration for efficient deployment and management of microservices, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment times and improved team collaboration.
Leveraged **AWS** and **GCP** cloud services for scalable infrastructure, processing over **1 million** orders monthly, ensuring high availability and low latency.
Engineered real-time features using **Kafka** and event-driven architecture, enabling immediate order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support, achieving a **30%** increase in customer satisfaction.
Developed responsive frontend applications with **TypeScript**, React (18), and Vue 3, delivering mobile-first user experiences and achieving a **25%** faster load time across devices.
Managed distributed data storage with **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, improving data access speeds by **50%** for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and effectively caching frequently accessed resources.
Integrated AI/ML recommendation engines using **TensorFlow** and **scikit-learn**, increasing conversion rates by **15%** through personalized product listings based on real-time behavioral analysis.
Implemented Redis caching layers for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, improving application responsiveness and reducing database read load by **60%**.
Conducted feature flagging and blue-green deployments with **LaunchDarkly**, enabling controlled rollouts and A/B testing while minimizing risk during major platform updates.
Created engaging, SEO-friendly UI using **Next.js**, Vue 3 + Nuxt, and HTML5/CSS3, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) and optimizing for mobile engagement.
Built secure payment processes integrated with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, applying PCI-compliant measures for secure transaction handling.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) with **OAuth 2.0** to ensure secure access for users and admins, maintaining GDPR compliance and protecting user data throughout the platform.
